import React, {useRef, useState} from "react"; const ContactForm = () => { const [formSent, setFormSent] = useState(false) const [formContent, setFormContent] = useState({ email:"", name:"", message:"", }) const inputChange = (e:any) => { setFormContent({ ...formContent, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = (e :any) =>{ const formData = new FormData(); formData.set('email', formContent.email); // Set needed hardcoded values for Listrak form formData.set('_captcha', 'false'); fetch('https://formsubmit.co/0d4a65b9d8079e2eef27da8b90e1bb79', {method: 'POST', body: formData}) .then(response => setFormSent(true)) .catch(error => { }); } return

Obrigado por retirar um tempo para me contactar.
Como posso te ajudar hoje?
